title: HAL India Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Diploma Technician, Technician Electroplater Posts
description: The Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Diploma Technician, Technician Electroplater Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Mechanical Engineering and ITI can apply for the HAL India Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education...
